title: Cell 16
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Colin Low and Martin Duckworth
brief_description: Filmed at Collins Bay Penitentiary, Kingston, Ontario, this is a portrayal of the effects on the individual of incarceration. Prisons, the film shows, lock men in themselves, depriving their minds of normal life experiences, confiscating their humanity. Music - Eugene Grandmond and The Fifth Dimension. Voice and narration by Jim Morrison.
